name: Practice Project - Crystal Cavern
description: This is a project i created while following an Unreal Engine beginner's course. There are very limited features. The objective is to collect all the crystals on the map. It's very difficult, but it is possible to win. If you die, you get reset at the beginning of the level. To exit, use ALT+F4. When you reach the end of the second level, the game exits.
